title: DeepSeek â€” AI Tool Review
description: DeepSeek is a Chinese open-source AI lab's chat model that rivals GPT-4 at a fraction of the cost, with exceptional math and coding capabilities. DeepSeek is an AI research company from China that released DeepSeek-R1, a reasoning-focused model that matches or beats GPT-4o and Claude on many benchmarks while being open-source and significantly cheaper to run. The chat interface is free to use. DeepSeek V3 and R1 have taken the AI world by storm for their performance-to-cost ratio. Highlights: Open-source models freely available. Exceptional math and reasoning. GPT-4 level at much lower cost. Free web chat interface. Strong coding abilities.
